item.title: Install
item.description: Compiling From Source Dependencies Required: CMake Arnold SDK Optional: Visual Studio Community 2013 or later gcc-4.9 or later OpenImageIO (for image viewing and comparing) Windows clone source code from github git clone https://github.com/shihchinw/rlShaders.git source-root open msvc command prompt (e.g. VS2013 x64 Native Tools Command Prompt) and run cmake command for configuration: cd source-root mkdir build cd build cmake -G “NMake Makefiles” -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DARNOLD_ROOT=path-to-arnold-sdk -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=install-dir .. build and install nmake nmake install Linux clone source code from github git clone https://github.
